description: React component for a task item in a task management app, handling display, editing, completion toggling, and deletion of individual tasks.

methods.name: TaskItem
methods.description: React functional component rendering a task with controls for marking complete/incomplete, editing, and deleting.

methods.name: toggleComplete
methods.description: Asynchronously toggles the task's completion status by calling external API methods.

methods.name: saveEdit
methods.description: Saves task edits by calling external API and handles validation.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Deletes the task after user confirmation.
